import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import React from 'react' import {useLocation, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import {Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import FormContainer from "../components/FormContainer"; import CheckoutSteps from "../components/CheckoutSteps"; import {saveShippingAddress} from '../actions/cartActions' function ShippingScreen() { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const {shippingAddress} = cart const dispatch = useDispatch() const [address, setAddress] = useState(shippingAddress.address) const [city, setCity] = useState(shippingAddress.city) const [postalCode, setPostalCode] = useState(shippingAddress.postalCode) const [country, setCountry] = useState(shippingAddress.country) let navigate = useNavigate(); const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(saveShippingAddress({address, city, postalCode, country})) let pathname = '/payment' navigate(pathname) } return (

Shipping

Address setAddress(e.target.value)} > City setCity(e.target.value)} > Postal Code setPostalCode(e.target.value)} > Country setCountry(e.target.value)} >
) } export default ShippingScreen
